data.text: Ne awacho niya, “Abiro ritora e yorena,
To e seche mane ok awuo kendo alingʼ mos,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyisa giko mar ngimana
Iseketo ndalona obedo machiek ka bad dhano;
Dhano en mana tipo makadho kata ka owuotho koni gi koni,
To koro, yaye Ruoth, en angʼo ma amanyo?
Ne alingʼ alingʼa, kendo ne ok anyal yawo dhoga mondo awuo,
We ngʼiya, mondo achak abed moil kendo
